reviewText: As much as I love ZZ Top, and that love is great,I can't recommend this DVD because all it has arethe videos.  Whoever produced this DVD should takea lesson from, say, the Chemical Brothers DVD, whichshines because it contains a killer LIVE section.What's the use of a ZZ Top DVD that only has the videos?One's reaction to this tends to be: who cares?However, IF this DVD had contained a LIVE offering,then I'm sure it would've been among my favorite DVDs of all time.Hopefully in the near future ZZ Top will release a fantasticLIVE DVD.............please!

reviewText: This is hands down the best ZZ top DVD out there. It has all of the classic MTV videos, and some music videos I have neverseen before but I love the songs. Catchy songs and fun to watch videos.. Hard to believe that this is a band that only has threeband members.
summary: This is hands down the best ZZ top DVD out there

reviewText: ZZ Top's 'Greatest Hits' is a fantastic album.  This long awaited DVD has finally arrived.  This is not a NEW release, originally published on VHS in 1992; I've been waiting 15 years for the DVD edition (my VHS tape is worn thin).  This is a collection of the Music Videos originally shot for each of the songs on the Greatest Hits album.  The sound quality and picture are what one would expect from DVD - excellent.  Watching and listening to this on a big screen with surround sound - goose bumps.For ZZ Top fans this bit of 'nostalgia' is a must have.  For those unfamiliar with ZZ Top, it's a great introduction to both the group and their video vision...No there are not a lot of extras since this, as stated, is the original VHS released on DVD.That fact takes nothing from the quality of the music or the videos.  As a  previous reviewer mentioned, this is not 'The Chemical Brothers' - then again, the 'ZZ Top Greatest Hits' album/video was released when 'The Chemical Brothers' were charting their first single - so there is a big (decades worth of) difference.Both stand on their own separate merits - but it is like comparing apples to oranges.
Title: N/A
